name: 樹里
trans: Whew～～!

name: 凛世
text: ふふ……
trans: Fufu...

name: 果穂
text: ふわぁ～
trans: Fuwa～

name: 樹里
text: ──なぁ果穂、凛世
trans: ──Hey Kaho. Rinze.

name: 樹里
text:
幸せで楽しい時間ほど、別の関係ないことを
考えちまうのって、なんでなんだろうな？
trans:
I wonder why people tend to think about completely
unrelated matters when at peace.

name: 樹里
text:
人間はもっとこう、ただ目の前の幸福に集中できた方が
幸せなんじゃねーか？
trans:
Like, wouldn't it be better to focus on the happiness
you have in the moment?

name: 果穂
text:
幸福が、幸せ……
うーん、なんだか難しいです……
trans: Happiness and peace... Hmmm, that's a toughie...

name: 果穂
text: ……けどそれって、今みたいな感じってことですかっ？
trans:
Oh, are you talking about something like what
we're doing now?

name: 樹里
text: …………あぁ、そーだな……
trans: Huh. Yeah, I guess you're right...

name: 樹里
text:
──えーと……
はづきさんが言ってた物、これで全部揃ったよな？
trans:
Let's see. This should be everything Hazuki-san
asked us to buy, right?

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ、ばっちりですっ！
買い出し任務完了！　ですねっ
trans:
Yup, that's right! And with that, our shopping mission
is complete!

name: 樹里
text:
……
……そーいえばよー
trans:
......
By the way...

name: 樹里
text:
果穂と凛世は……
あのアンケート、どんな感じだ……？
trans: What did you two think about that questionnaire?

name: 果穂
text: この前もらった、雑誌用のアンケートですかっ？
trans:
Are you talking about that one questionnaire for
the magazine?

name: 樹里
text: ……そうそう、あの──
trans: Yeah, yeah. That one.

name: 凛世
text: 『Motto教えて♡アイドル赤裸々恋愛白書』……
trans:
"Please teach me♡An idol's steaming hot confessions
of love..."

name: 樹里
text: そ……それだよ……
trans: Yeah... That...

name: 樹里
text:
……アタシはさ、どうもそういう……恋愛観？
みたいなのは得意じゃねーからさ……全然進まなくて……
trans:
Well, I don't have enough experience to give...
confessions of love? I'm really not the one to talk to
about this so I can't really recommend anything...

name: 果穂
text:
あたしも、書けてないです……
凛世さんはどうですかっ？
trans: Yeah, same here... How about you Rinze-san?

name: 凛世
text: 凛世は……もう……
trans: I have... already completed it...

name: 樹里
text: え、もうか！？　はえーな！
trans: Wait, no way! That was fast!

name: 凛世
text:
凛世の心は……
決まっておりますゆえ……
trans: My heart... has already decided long ago...

name: 樹里
text:
な、なるほど……
凛世、さすがだな……
trans: I see... Rinze, you're as impressive as ever...

name: 果穂
text:
凛世さん、やっぱりスゴいですっ！
恋愛博士です……っ！
trans:
Wow, you're so cool, Rinze-san!
You're like a love professor!

name: 果穂
text:
……あれっ？　そういえば、
前に樹里ちゃんも、恋について詳しいって……
trans:
Wait a minute. Juri-chan, didn't you talk about love
in detail before?

name: 樹里
text: ！？　お、覚えてたのか……
trans: Huh!? So, you remembered that huh...

name: 樹里
text:
……それは……あれだよ、その～……
も、もっと大人になってからって言ったろ？
trans:
Well... That was then, and this is now and...
Y-You'll understand once you're older, alright!?

name: 果穂
text:
そうでした！　楽しみにしてます！
えへへ、はやく大人になりたいな～
trans:
You're right! I can't wait!
Ehehe, I really hope I become a grown-up soon～

name: 凛世
text:
……？
あちらは……

name: 樹里
text:
おー、くじ引きだな
そーいやさっきの買い物で、抽選券もらってたっけ……
trans:
A lottery wheel, huh? Now that I think of it, we
should be able to spin it a few times with how much
we bought earlier.

name: 果穂
text: わぁ……！　くじ引き……！！
trans: Wow! So, this is a lottery wheel!

name: 樹里
text:
結構枚数あるし……
せっかくだし引いてくか
trans:
We got a good number shots at this...
Let's give it a whirl!

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ！
えーっと……景品は……
trans: Yeah! Let's see... So, we get a freebie...

name: 樹里
text:
１等……
『１組３名様、日帰り温泉旅行券』……
trans: First prize: a one day trip to the onsen for three.

name: 凛世
trans: A trip for three...

name: 樹里
text:
これ当たったら逆に困るよな……
……まぁ、そうそう当たんねーか
trans:
If we do manage to win, I dunno how we'll be able to
use or split the reward... Then again, there's no way
we could win that.

name: 果穂
text:
……あっ！
『ジャスティスV』の新しい変形合体ロボがありますっ！！
trans:
Ah! They also have Justice V's new transforming
robot action figure!

name: 樹里
text: お！　３等か……それなら当たるんじゃねーか？
trans:
Oh! That's the third prize, huh. Yeah, I think it's
possible for us to win that.

name: 樹里
text:
よし、ならこの抽選券は全部果穂のもんだ
凛世もそれでいいか？
trans:
Alright, in that case this is all you, Kaho.
You good with that, Rinze?

name: 凛世
text: はい……
trans: Yes...

name: 果穂
text:
ホントですかっ！？　ありがとうございますっ
それじゃああたし、やってみますっ！
trans:
Really? Thank you very much!
Now, let's give this thing a try!

name: 樹里
text: あぁ、頑張れよ！
trans: Yeah, good luck!

name: 果穂
text: はいっ！　よーし……
trans: Thanks! Alrighty...

name: 果穂
text: えいやっ！
trans: There!

name: 凛世
text: ……白い玉
trans: A white ball...

name: 樹里
text:
あー
残念賞……ティッシュだ
trans:
Ah, that's unfortunate...
That just gets you a tissue...

name: 果穂
text:
も、もう１回お願いしますっ！
ていっ！
trans: Let me try one more time! Go!

name: 凛世
text: また……
trans: The same...

name: 樹里
text:
大丈夫だ！
まだ券は結構残ってんぞ！
trans:
You still got this!
We got a few more rolls left after all!

name: 果穂
text:
は、はい！　まだまだっ……
──えいやっ！
trans:
Y-Yes, you're right! Let's keep going!
──Eiya!

name: 果穂
text: えいやっ！！
trans: Eiyaa!!

name: 果穂
text: えいやーーっ！！
trans: Eiyaaa!!!

name: 果穂
text:
……うぅ～～っ
ティッシュばっかりです……
trans: Ugh～ I only got tissues...

name: 凛世
text: いえ……
trans: Not quite...

name: 凛世
text:
外れの玉を……
５つ……減らしたのです……
trans:
There are still balls left... 
That was... only five...

name: 樹里
text:
そ、そうだよな！
……それに、まだわかんねーぞ！
trans:
Yeah, she's right!
As long as you have some left, you still have a shot!

name: 果穂
text: でももう、あと１回しか引けないです……
trans: But, that only gives us one more try...

name: 凛世
text:
負けて当然……
勝って偶然……
trans: A loss is to be expected... A win is to be a surprise...

name: 凛世
text:
ですが……
おもしろくなって……参りました……
trans:
But... 
This has definitely... become exciting...

name: 果穂
text: 凛世さん……
trans: Rinze-san...

name: 果穂
text:
……──凛世さんっ
あたしの代わりに、最後の１回、引いてくれませんか？
trans:
──Rinze-san.
Do you mind if you do the final roll instead of me?

name: 凛世
text: 凛世が……？

name: 果穂
text:
はい！　凛世さんなら、なんだかスッゴいことを
起こせそうな気がします！　お願いしますっ！
trans:
Yeah! I feel that if you do it, then something amazing
will happen! Please!

name: 樹里
text:
確かに凛世なら当てられそーだな……
頼んだぜ、凛世！
trans:
That's true. If it's Rinze, we'll definitely be able to
win something. If you're up to it, I'll be counting on
you, Rinze!

name: 凛世
text:
果穂さん……樹里さん……
では……
trans:
Kaho-san... Juri-san... 
Allow me...

name: 凛世
text: 黄金色で……ございます……
trans: It's... golden...

name: 樹里
text:
こ……この色って……
１等じゃねーのか！？
trans: G-Golden? Isn't that the first prize!?

name: 果穂
text:
り、凛世さんっ！
スゴすぎますっ……！
trans: Ri-Rinze! You're as always so amazing!

name: 樹里
text:
ああ、すげーよ凛世！
目当てのおもちゃではねー……けど……
trans:
Holy crap, Rinze!
It's not the toy we wanted... but...

name: 樹里
text:
……あー……でも、よ
──１等ってことは……
trans: Ah... But the first prize was...

name: 凛世
trans: For three...

name: 樹里
text: …………どーするよ、コレ……
trans: Now what should we do...
